name: Drones (itch)
description:
The first installment in a series of five interactive works, 5 Things He Can't Live Without, that chronicles the loss of self as you follow the rituals of a online celebrity personality. 

Following the death of your grandfather, you find a new role model in this enigmatic man.

Instructions :  Move the mouse and use the scroll wheel to interact

Webcam will be accesssed briefly during the experience*

With music by Elias Nox & Thalia Rodgers
